name: Cisco | IOS | Network | OAM | Client Clear Remote Failure (SYSLOG)
description: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI_CLEAR: The client on interface %s has received a clear of remote failure indication from its remote peer(failure reason = %s action = %s)
event_class__name: Network | OAM | Client Clear Remote Failure
message_rx: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI_CLEAR: The client on interface (?P<interface>\S+) has received a clear of remote failure indication from its remote peer\s*\(failure reason = (?P<reason>.+)\)

test_cases.message: %ETHERNET_OAM-6-RFI_CLEAR: The client on interface %s has received a clear of remote failure indication from its remote peer(failure reason = %s action = %s)
